Package com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LexicalEntry
    A single lexical entry for a given string.
    LexicalEntryReader
    Reads lexical entries from any source whatsoever.
    Lexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon.
    PosTaggerLexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon, including pos-tag specific information.
    PosTagMapper
    Used to retrieve a set of pos-tags for a given lexical entry.
    WritableLexicalEntry
    A writable lexical entry.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompactLexicalEntry
    A compact lexical entry, using a related CompactLexicalEntrySupport to efficiently store reference data.
    CompactLexicalEntrySupport
    A class storing reference data to support compact lexical entries.
    DefaultPosTagMapper
    Pos-tag mapper which assumes the entry's category is already a pos-tag.
    Diacriticizer
    An interface for retrieving, for a given original word, assumed to be uppercase without diacritics, the various lowercase possibilities which can contain diacritics.
    EmptyLexicon
    An Empty lexicon to use as a placeholder when no lexicon is available.
    LexiconChain
    A chain of lexicons that can be used to pool lexical information.
    LexiconDeserializer
    Used to deserialize a zip file containing an ordered set of lexicons serialized by the LexiconReader.
    LexiconFile
    A lexicon contained in a text file with one line per entry.
    LexiconReader
    Given a set of lexicons described in a properties file, reads them into a list of PosTaggerLexicon objects, using regex descriptors to read lexical attributes from the files.
    RegexLexicalEntryReader
    A lexical entry reader where the lexical attributes are identified via a set of regex.
    SimplePosTagMapper
    Pos-tag mapper that maps lexical attributes to postags using a tab-delimited file as input.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LexicalAttribute
    The currently supported lexical attributes.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon Description

Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g. filters which automatically lowercase known words).
